name: Integrate Agency
description:
Integrate is an award-winning, fully-integrated, digital and traditional marketing agency specializing in public relations, social media, digital marketing and website conversion and optimization. Integrate’s staff brings the right mix of communications backgrounds and a unique, creative thought process that helps clients around the country “Integrate” their entire marketing mix. 
Integrate has been a trailblazer in the unique combination and integration of PR, social media, website building and digital marketing for the last 10 years and the team has a keen understanding of how traditional and digital channels can work together to launch brands and drive business growth.
We’ve helped our customers increase sales conversions through more effective websites, drive awareness through splashy national media coverage, increase sales through effective digital marketing campaigns, changed perception through reputation management efforts on social media, delivered measured online sales traffic from influencers with hypertargeted reach, and so much more.
We are true partners to our clients - we don’t waste their time with vague opinions, subjective facts, or vanity metrics; we are motivated by the metrics and data that prove our tactics and move the needle for our clients’ businesses.
